page.shortlink: api objects session object save data as file method
page.description: Saves the value to the session-state collection under IIS.

prototypes.prototype: Context.Session.SaveDataAsFile as L (FileName as C, Value as C [, RemoveAfterFirstRetrieval as L])
Context.Session.SaveDataAsFile as L (FileName as C, Value as B [, RemoveAfterFirstRetrieval as L])

argument.name: FileName
argument.description: The name of the file to be saved. This name should not have any path components.

argument.name: Value
argument.description: The characters to be saved. The characters are converted to a UTF-8 stream of bytes that are saved.

argument.name: RemoveAfterFirstRetrieval
argument.description: Default value is .t.. This is reserved for future use.

page.discussion: Context.Session.SaveDataAsFile() saves the value to the session-state collection under IIS. Under the stand-alone application server, the value is written to disk in the stand-alone application server's session folder. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.

ref.link: api objects session object format file data url method
